title: Karthus voice MIA?
body: So a about a week or so ago I was playing Karthus, and as people who play Karthus do. I tried to spam dance and there was a distinct lack of "WOOOOOOOOOOOOOO". A friend of mine, 'Wolfie', got Kathus in an ARAM later that day and confirmed that Karthus has lost his voice.

replies.body:
Hiya Your Mate Steve! 

Thanks for the report! He's been playing a ton of Pentakill gigs and is a bit hoarse. D: We're looking to get up back to his old self next patch! ^-^
It kind of happens when you screamo for a living
